question:
Which among the following is/ are true about Panchayat Samiti?
1. It is also known as Block Samiti
2. About 20 members are elected by all Panchayats in a Block
3. Two women members are elected from SC & ST
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Panchayat Samiti is also known as Block Samiti. About 20 members are elected by all Panchayats in a Block. Two women members are elected from SC & ST each. It is headed by a chairman.
